resources.string: Wuhan university of science and technology of computer college in yujiatou campus \n At present,there are computer college with computer science and technology, software engineering, physical networking engineering three undergraduate professionals and a network engineering undergraduate professional pilot. There have \"computer science and technology as the first level subject doctor\'s degrees award authority,\" computer science and technology as the first level subject master\'s degree award authority, \"computer technology\" and "software engineering" master of engineering degree of architecture and \"computer application technology\" teacher in university master degree of architecture. \"Computer application technology\" for the Hubei province key discipline, formed from undergraduate to graduate and professional doctor degree education complete training system.
